pages.text: Placing special blocks on top of the beacon pyramid will unlock different effects for your Beacon.$(br2)The blocks must be placed at the same layer as the Beacon block itself, and will replace effects from the beacon.$(br2)Check the $(l:mechanics/custom_potions)New Potions$() page for any you may not recognise.

pages.title: Night Vision
pages.text: $(bold)Beacon Tier: 1$()$(br2)Using any color of $(item)Cave Crystal$() will have the beacon provide $(thing)Night Vision$().

pages.title: Danger Sight
pages.text: $(bold)Beacon Tier: 2$()$(br2)Using a $(item)Glowshroom Block$() (harvestable with Silk Touch from a big Glowshroom) will have the beacon provide $(thing)Danger Sight$().

pages.title: Fire Resistance
pages.text: $(bold)Beacon Tier: 3$()$(br2)Using $(item)Frostburn Ice$() will have the beacon provide $(thing)Fire Resistance$().

pages.title: Water Breathing
pages.text: $(bold)Beacon Tier: 3$()$(br2)Using $(item)Coral Reef$() will have the beacon provide $(thing)Water Breathing$().

pages.title: Learning
pages.text: $(bold)Beacon Tier: 3$()$(br2)Using a $(item)Pixie Dust Block$() will have the beacon provide $(thing)Learning$().

pages.title: Hunger
pages.text: $(bold)Beacon Tier: 3$()$(br2)Using a $(item)Rotten Flesh Block$() will have the beacon provide $(thing)Hunger$().$(br2)You monster.
